mapper.select: select a.id,a.session,a.companyid,a.companyname,a.relationcompanyid,a.relationcompanyname ,a.remark,a.agent,vw.uname as agentname,a.status,a.paystatus,a.addtime ,a.printstatus ,case printstatus when 0 then '未打印' when 1 then '打印中' when 2 then '已打印' end as printstatusname ,a.printtime ,a.printtype ,case printtype when -1 then '' when 0 then '正常打印' when 1 then 'IC卡打印' end printtypename ,a.makecardtime, a.isforensics as isforensics, a.forensicstime as forensicstime, a.certificatenumber as certificatenumber, a.printnumber as printnumber ,a.reviewremark ,a.isplastic ,a.isback ,a.plastictime ,a.relationcompanyid ,a.relationcompanyname ,a.paystatus ,case a.paystatus when 0 then '待缴费' when 1 then '已缴费' end paystatusname ,a.audittime ,a.safetyresponsibilitycommit ,a.fitmentapplication ,a.effectdiagram ,a.constructiondiagram ,a.pointdiagram ,a.circuitdiagram ,a.workercertificatecopy ,a.equipmentqualifiedprove ,a.workercasualtyprove from ebs_stadium as a left join vw_Frontend_user_integration as vw on vw.isback=a.isback and vw.uid=a.agent where a.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from ebs_stadium where agent=#{memberid} and session=#{session}
delete from ebs_stadium where agent=#{memberId} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ebs_stadium.companyname) EnterprisesNumber, COUNT(ebs_stadium.id) certificatesTotalNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) pendingAuditNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN status = -1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) failedAuditNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) ReviewedCertificatesNumber, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN printstatus = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) Printed, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (status = 1 and isplastic = 1 and printstatus = 0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) noPrinted, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN isback = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) greenChannelCertificatesNumber FROM ebs_stadium INNER JOIN cm_certificate_type ON cm_certificate_type.type = 1 AND ebs_stadium.cardtype = cm_certificate_type.id INNER JOIN vw_agentstatus ON vw_agentstatus.memberid = ebs_stadium.agent AND vw_agentstatus.makeevidence = 1 WHERE ebs_stadium.session = #{session}
